title: Twisted
description: Come back to Arcana falls for more biting, claiming, and knotting wolf shifters.It’s Mason Quinn’s turn to claim his fated mate. He smells her and it’s forever at first scent.Does it matter that the first thing she does after he takes her mouth is spray his face with Mace? Nope.Does it deter him that she keeps trying to run away, determined this is sorcery, not fate? Absolutely not.He's certain - witchcraft or not, this is meant to be.It just might take a whole lot of chasing and knotting to convince his emotionally damaged mate that the knot tying them together is permanent.Twisted is book two in the Savage Alpha Shifters series. These books should be read in order, starting with Wild.
author: D.D. Prince
